snippet: The N.B.A. is expected to make a ruling before the next Knicks game on whether Carmelo Anthony will be suspended for trying to confront the Celtics’ Kevin Garnett after Monday’s game.
abstract: NBA is expected to make ruling before next New York Knicks game on whether forward Carmelo Anthony will be suspended for trying to confront Boston Celtics forward Kevin Garnett after game.

byline.contributor: Peter May contributed reporting from Boston.

lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. is expected to make a ruling before the next Knicks game on whether Carmelo Anthony will be suspended for trying to confront the Celtics’ Kevin Garnett after Monday’s game.

headline.seo: Anthony Says Garnett’s Trash Talk Affected His Game
headline.main: After Losing His Cool, Anthony May Lose Time
headline.print_headline: After Losing His Cool, Anthony May Lose Time
